ratings.comment: She wants us to read the stories from home that are 40 pages long in 1 day and come to class and participate. attendance is mandatory(more than 3 leaves, you go one grade down). Useless quizzes. Constantly drinking water from her pink bottle. tough grader and the final paper was 12 pages long which was the main base for grade. how ridiculous grader
Uploads grades until the end of the semester  Monotone lectures  Not organized  She is friendly most of the times
Most disorganized class I have ever taken.
useless. Attending lecture was a waste, horrible TA, miserable overall... In short, painfull...god sakes, find another class!!

This is the worst class I have ever taken.  Not only does HDB strut around the stage talking about useless Sh*t and grabbing her water bottle constantly, but she gives the most worthless paper topics in the world that are supposed to be about the most worthless books i have ever read.  This class made me want to end my life each and every day.
This class was so painful to go to I am contemplating if it was even worth the easiest A I've ever received in my life.  If you are DESPERATE for a good grade, take it.  If not, steer clear.

Oh man, where to start. MANDATORY ATTENDANCE for a lecture in which you do NOTHING. It's astoundingly dull; and the papers...oh, the papers.  Enforce a strict 4-5 page limit. 5.1 pages? ReJECTED. 3.999 pages? Reee-JECTED. Mandatory topics? Oh, yeah. Creativity encouraged? No. Thinking encouraged? No. Take the class? NO. Avoid at all costs.

This class made me come so close to hating african literature. That is how horrendous a professor she was. Her literary analyses were so incredibly simplistic and mind numbingly boring it took all of the joy out of reading it. The only thing that kept me going to class was the mandatory attendance.
